explains: n. 玩忽职守，营私舞弊；治疗失当，医疗差错；不端行为，胡作非为
wordGroup: malpractice insurance 医疗事故保险

sentences.en: There were only one or two serious allegations of malpractice.
sentences.cn: 只有一两起严肃的渎职指控。

sentences.en: Missing from these bills is any serious attempt to rein in malpractice costs.
sentences.cn: 这些法案中没有任何严格控制渎职造成的支出的措施。

sentences.en: One could even say it is marketing malpractice.
sentences.cn: 人们甚至可以将它称为营销违规行为。
